apply-to.help: Apply password policy to administrator passwords or IPsec pre-shared keys or both. Separate entries with a space.
apply-to.name: apply-to

change-4-characters.help: Enable/disable changing at least 4 characters for a new password (This attribute overrides reuse-password if both are enabled).
change-4-characters.name: change-4-characters

options.help: Enable requiring that at least 4 characters must be changed in a new password.
options.name: enable

options.help: No requirements for the number of characters to change in a new password. A new password can be the same as the old password.
options.name: disable

expire-day.help: Number of days after which passwords expire (1 - 999 days, default = 90).
expire-day.name: expire-day

min-lower-case-letter.help: Minimum number of lowercase characters in password (0 - 128, default = 0).
min-lower-case-letter.name: min-lower-case-letter

min-non-alphanumeric.help: Minimum number of non-alphanumeric characters in password (0 - 128, default = 0).
min-non-alphanumeric.name: min-non-alphanumeric

min-number.help: Minimum number of numeric characters in password (0 - 128, default = 0).
min-number.name: min-number

min-upper-case-letter.help: Minimum number of uppercase characters in password (0 - 128, default = 0).
min-upper-case-letter.name: min-upper-case-letter

reuse-password.help: Enable/disable reusing of password (if both reuse-password and change-4-characters are enabled, change-4-characters overrides).
reuse-password.name: reuse-password

options.help: Administrators are allowed to reuse the same password.
options.name: enable

options.help: Administrators must create a new password.
options.name: disable

status.help: Enable/disable setting a password policy for locally defined administrator passwords and IPsec VPN pre-shared keys.
status.name: status

results.help: Configure password policy for locally defined administrator passwords and IPsec VPN pre-shared keys.
results.name: password-policy
